summary: Added language-aware teammate routing to team skills. Lean tasks now spawn teammates with lean-lsp MCP tool access, blocked tool warnings, and Lean-specific workflow guidance.

completion_data.completion_summary: Added language-aware teammate routing to skill-team-research, skill-team-plan, and skill-team-implement. For Lean tasks, teammates are now spawned with lean-lsp MCP tool instructions, blocked tool warnings, and verification requirements (lake build). Non-Lean tasks preserve existing generic prompts.
